 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרָבָה‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** ==poplar== (***populus Euphratica*** = Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#We|We]] in [[BDB#De|De]]<sup>Gn (4), 568</sup> Kersten<sup>ZPV ii. 209</sup> [[BDB#De|De]]<sup>Is (4) 44, 4</sup> [[BDB#Löw|Löw]]<sup>p. 300 Anm</sup>.; Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרָבָה‎</span> √ obscure); — plural absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרָבִים עַליִֿבְלֵימָֿ֑יִם‎</span> [[Isa.44.4|Isa 44:4]], compare [[Ps.137.2|Ps 137:2]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַרְבֵינָֿ֑חַל‎</span>[[Lev.23.40|Lev 23:40]] ([[BDB#H|H]]), [[Job.40.22|Job 40:22]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַחַלהָֿעֲרָבִים‎</span> [[Isa.15.7|Isa 15:7]] (a wady in Moab; identification dubious, see conjectures in [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Geogr. 124</sup>).
